author: Fextralife
description:
Nightreign Everdark Sovereign CALIGO Miasma of Night UPDATE & GAMEPLAY, TIPS & New GEAR
In this Elden Ring Nightreign video, we're going to be taking a look at the new Everdark Sovereign event. This is Caligo Miasma of Night, which is the Ice Dragon, arguably one of the best, if not most entertaining, fights in all of the Elden Ring Souls Games. Just from the soundtrack, the aesthetics of it, and the Everdark version of this fight is even better.

Elden Ring Nightreign Wiki: https://eldenringnightreign.wiki.fextralife.com/Elden+Ring+Nightreign+Wiki

Timestamp:
0:00 Everdark Sovereign Event
0:31 New Relic
1:22 Caligo Miasma of Night Everdark Sovereign Event
